text: The point of this Android App was to take the time out of calculating and formatting for social media posts.
After clicking the + widget, user is met with a screen to start reviewing.
This page contains everything needed to start and finish a review to get formatted after input.
Both categorical and overall ratings are calculated through inputs. Click +/- to increment by 0.5 points up to 10.
There is a section to write thoughts at the end once user has finished inputting thoughts on the categories.
Sometimes there are extras that the base chicken sandwich does not contain (i.e. pickles, coleslaw, etc.).
Dynamically add these throughout the Rating Phase to add to the 'Alternative' Overall Score as to not overlap with standard sandwiches.
